page.title: 17SPORTS AND LEISURE
page.content: HATCHFORD BROOK GOLF COURSE IS AN 18 HOLE MUNICIPLE GOLF COURSE ON THE A45 NEAR BIRMINGHAM AIRPORT.IT OPENS AT 9am AND CLOSES AT 9pm DAILY.YOU CAN HIRE CLUBS FOR EITHER Â£7 A WEEK OR Â£2 PER-DAY.IT COSTS Â£3.20 EACH TO PLAY A ROUND OF GOLF AND Â£1.60 FOR JUNIORS.THE GOLF COURSE IS OPEN ALL YEAR-ROUND. THE SILVER WINGS CLUB IS NEXT TO THE EXCELSIOR HOTEL ON THE A45,THIS IS A SOCIAL CLUB FOR BRITISH AIRWAYS PERSONEL AND FLYING CLUB MEMBERS. DISCOS ARE HELD REGULARY. THE CIVIL SERVICE SPORTS CLUB,ON THE A45,PROVIDES CRICKET,5-A-SIDE FOOTBALL,POOL,DARTS,TENNIS AND FISHING FOR CIVIL SERVANTS IN THE BIRMINGHAM AREA.
